department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Science

course.title: Rethinking the "Origins" of Science: Science, Religion, and Culture in Medieval Europe and the Lands of Islam
course.faculty_text: Katharine Park and Ahmed Ragab (Divinity School)
course.description: This is the graduate section to History of Science 101, Communities of Knowledge: Science, Religion, and Culture in Medieval Europe and the Lands of Islam. Students are required to attend the lectures in History of Science 101.
